stim_text: February has the fewest days of all months.
The Earth is smaller than the Sun.
School is a place for children to have fun with their friends.
Using straws to drink is much more enjoyable than drinking directly from the cup.
Having a drink every now and then is a good way to relax.
Teenagers who bully their classmates should be scolded.
Genetic engineers should prevent birth defects in babies.
In winter, it is better to wake homeless people sleeping on the street than to ignore them.
Nothing is more awesome than driving in a Hummer.
Babies that are temperamental are aggravating to spend time around.
Supermarkets should not pass of expired milk as fresh.
Destroying the habitats of owls through deforestation is deplorable.
The "hoots" of owls in the woods make camping more enjoyable.
Nothing is less appealing than the smell of rotting fish.
Universal donors should not be obligated to donate their blood.
People should listen to music during a mountain-hike.
Watching movies with friends is enjoyable.
People should stretch before every workout.
A football referee should not help his favored team win.
Dogs make better pets than lizards.
Runners should not bump into pedestrians in the street.
People should leave priority seats vacant for pregnant women.
An intern should not exaggerate about his participation in a project.
Stomach cancer is the worst disease you can have.
People should help their elderly neighbors clear snow from their driveway.
Gamblers should not bet their children's college funds.
A tattoo artist should have many original tattoo designs.
It is unethical for business to promote sugary products to children.
A public pool should leave lifeguarding duties to parents.
Parents should pack ramen for lunch on a rainy day.
In winter, people should wear button-down coats and scarfs.
It is unjust for businesses to allow apples to rot rather than giving them to the needy.
Drinking coffee is a joyful experience when you are tired and need energy.
Zookeepers should keep safe and clean environments for animals.
Rock music is pleasing to the ear, and much more agreeable than rap music.
Parents should be wiling to make sacrifices for the benefit of their baby.
Driving after drinking heavily is a stupid and selfish way to behave.
Many games are better than Monopoly, which is incredibly boring.
In a gym, people should wipe sweat off after equipment use.
Churchgoers should read the Bible in a book, not on their phones.
Afterschool programs involving sports are more fun than most of the alternatives available to children.
People should check their bank accounts every month.
A married couple should not have an affair.
Money spent on space project is wasteful.
Students should take classes outside their comfort zones.
It is not OK for doctors to accidentally kill a small number of patients per year.
A married couple should spend at least some time outdoors.
Using straws is harmful to the environment.
Money earned illegally should be refused if offered by a friend.
It is irresponsible for airlines to risk the safety of their passengers.
People should not give too many snacks to their children before a meal.
The goal of sports should be to teach children that respect for others is more important than winning.
You shouldn't embarrass or humiliate your friends.
A mother should allow her children the freedom to pursue their own interests.
Private beaches are not immoral, as everyone should be able to share the space.
Runners should eat plenty of bananas before a marathon.
Teachers should penalize students who didn't contribute to group projects.
People should not sneak into movie theaters without paying.
Good Americans buy American cars, such as Hummers.
A football referee should run as much as the athletes.
Restaurant owners should train the waiters to check on a table at least twice.
Eating fish is acceptable if they were treated humanely when caught or raised.
Having blood drawn is not a pleasurable experience.
Athletes who fail to follow the doping code should be ousted.
Churchgoers should donate generously to the collection plate.
In the wintertime, it is fun to catch snowflakes on the tip of your tongue.
Children should not put their parents into nursing homes.
Going through airport security is an unpleasant experience.
Teachers should arrange many interactive field trips.
Dogs are not worth the stress and aggravation it takes to own them.
Employees should never fake sick day.
Gamblers should bet with real money, as it is more exciting.
People should watch more thought-provoking movies.
People should walk to their work.
